about_the_game:
Oh, Hel No! combines crafting, base-building, and horde survival in a wild journey of chicken-esque and demonic ambition. As a scrappy little imp banished to the surface, you’ve got one mission: prove yourself, survive waves of enemies, and conquer the trials of Hel to reclaim your throne.

Play solo or with friends in the Overworld to gather resources, craft gear, level up skills, and build a killer base. Then, descend into Hel to face off in never-ending battles that’ll push you to the limit!

BUILD, CRAFT & EXPLORE THE OVERWORLD

The Overworld is where you gather resources, upgrade gear, explore hidden activities, and build a base to keep you prepared. Craft epic armor, discover stat-boosting recipes, and set up workshops for your next journey into Hel.

VENTURE INTO HEL, FIGHT, & LEVEL UP

Entering Hel ain't gonna be easy, you need Infernal Keys crafted from rarest of Overworld resources (Just some rocks...). With each wave, enemies get stronger, so expand your gear and refine your materials to keep up! AND BRING EXTRAS!

Defeat waves of minions, earn XP, and unlock Talent Points to boost your combat and resource skills. How you play is up to you!

BRING YOUR FRIENDS

Team up to build, battle, or just hang out and enjoy some in-game downtime... with Chickens if you want. Chickens are friends...

KEY FEATURES

  • Game Loop: Gather, craft, battle, repeat! Prepare in the Overworld and face waves of enemies in Hel until you’re ready to take on the Champion.

  • Base-Building & Crafting: Set up workshops, cook for stat boosts, and keep resources flowing with a mix of strategy and chill.

  • Horde Survival Combat: Face waves of enemies that only get tougher with each round!

  • Talent System: Level up and customize combat and resource perks to match your play style.

  • Overworld Shenanigans: Play mini-games, pet chickens, and explore while gearing up for the next big battle.

Are you ready to rise and claim the throne? Let’s dive in!

Oh... and Chickens...

short_description: Get ready to raise a little hell as an ambitious Demon Imp who’s been kicked out of Hel and stuck with the surface-dwellers. Time to flex those horns, fight, level up, and prove you’ve got what it takes to handle Hel’s hottest challenges and maybe—just maybe—claim the throne as Hel’s new big boss!
